resources.string: Coffee legend, truly the first proper, prof run specialty coffee place in Prague
Reading room with many events through the week, ring the bell to get in.
Definitely one of the more hipster spots in Prague. Right in the city center.
Charming atmosphere, vegan options, indie music, awesome working spot.
Great concerts, trendy place, chill atmosphere and good selection of drinks.
Cute hipster cafe with snacks and delicious lunch options.
Great art\'s parties, concerts, theatre. Located in old meat factory.
Great coffee, young people, clean simple design, friendly atmosphere.
Authentic old school atmosphere with a retro cinema.
Cozy hipster place with perfect coffee and fresh food.
Raw and vegan restaurant, alternative cuisine, filling and delicious.
Old retro bicycles collected, painted pink and placed around Prague. Download their app and happily ride to see Prague.
Stretch of pavement next to the banks of the Vltava (Rašínovo nábřeží) with many alternative bars and restaurants.
Lovely area between the National Theatre and the New Stage known for the alternative events, such as Dyzajn Market.
Try out their cheesecake and homemade lemonade while sitting outside.
Restaurant with a bakery that combines the old and the new.
If you are sick of all the posh bars around, this is a great option.
This versatile space is center for alternative art, music and theater.
Large square in the popular Žižkov district. It hosts a popular farmer’s market every Wednesday, Friday and Saturday.
Picturesque neighborhood with its small houses, packed with small business, cafes, workshops, bars and restaurants.
